attributes.action: WE (the people of uk) SHOULD GET A VOTE ON ANY NEW LAWS AND ACTS THAT GOVERN US, BEFORE THEY CAN BE PASSED
attributes.additional_details:
We the people should get a vote on our laws/Acts. No law/act should be passed if it is not consented by the governed (the citizens).
We could do this with a simple app on android or website online.
PLEASE SIGN THIS  E-PETITION AND SUPPORT THIS CAUSE AS THIS IS FOR YOUR FUTURE AND THE GENERATIONS TO COME.

MANY THANKS

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: Citizens right to vote.

Created by: Jake Jordan

Closing: 11/11/2014
